ygData.subject: Re: Weird thing that happens when I cast mesmorize
ygData.msgSnippet: me too!  as far as my experience has been....in situations with multiple mobs, the non-mezzed mobs always become my new best friend. Thereby, i d recommed
ygData.messageBody:
me too! as far as my experience has been....in situations with
multiple mobs, the non-mezzed mobs always become my new best friend.
Thereby, i'd recommed using this only in situations where you are in a group
that can handle the remaining mobs, or in attacking 2 or 3 mobs....with one
mezzed, leaving 1 to attack you.

Fistlebane, High Elf Enchanter of Rathe server




From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...> on 05/18/99 01:59 PM
PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Weird thing that happens when I
cast mesmorize

From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

I guess I missed the window wherein mesmerize wasn't considered an
attack
spell by nearby mobs...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Miller, Keith A. [SMTP:keithm@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 3:56 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Weird thing that happens when I
cast
> mesmorize
>
> From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>
>
> Well, thats the way I suspect it should work. Too bad, guess its
back to
> the risky soothe <hurry> soothe <hurry> pull routine. I would not
ever
> try
> to soothe more than 2 mobs, unles you enjoy a whole camp jumping
on you.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: scott@... [mailto:scott@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 3:50 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Weird thing that happens when I cast
mesmorize
>
>
> From: scott@...
>
> Previously when I casted it, the monster would just stand and no
other
> monsters would react.
>
> Recently though, when I cast it and there are other monsters
around, they
> come running while the mesmorized one just stands there.
>
> Anyone know why that happens?
>
> Azboklin the enchanter
>
>
